channel.title: Statfilling image
channel.description:
Hi! Since a few weeks i've got a site called [url=http://www.members.lycos.nl/runerocks]Runerocks[/url]! But i need someone to meek me a stat filler... Like, someone fills in his name and with a get his stats and name shows up in an image!
Could someone make a script for me if i bring u the image?
Thank you verry VERRY much :)
PS: Pretty lame english here eh :|

item.title: Statfilling image
item.dc:creator: @matthias9 matthias9
item.description:
@matthias9 wrote:

It works but I can’t add my own stat sig to it!
And it’s quite hard to make it work with my little system
Could you change this file so it will fit with my image:

[code]<?php

// Set the font settings
require FONTDIR . ‘rsfont.php’;

// Determine the order of skills in the image
$skills = array(
‘Attack’,
‘Strength’,
‘Defence’,
‘Hitpoints’,
‘Magic’,

'Prayer',
'Agility',
'Slayer',
'Construction',
'Crafting',

'Fletching',
'Herblore',
'Firemaking',
'Woodcutting',
'Farming',

'Cooking',
'Fishing',
'Runecrafting',
'Thieving',

'Ranged',
'Mining',
'Smithing',

);

// Write the skills into the picture (handy for loop for equally spaced numbers)
$count = count($skills);
for ($i = 0; $i < $count; $i++)
{
$img->write_level(
45 + 61 * ($i % 7),
17 + 31 * floor($i / 7),
$skills[$i]
);
}

$img->write_level(411, 110, ‘Construction’);

// Write the stuff in the bottom
$img->write_name(84, 103);
$img->write_level(84, 117, ‘Overall’);
$img->write_rank(220, 103, ‘Overall’);
$img->write_xp(220, 117, ‘Overall’);

imagedestroy($font);

?>[/code]
Image:

Thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: Statfilling image
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

http://www.anthd.com/rithiur/downloads/file.php?k=rshiscore pretty leet and noob friendly

you may also want to add some antispam for the mailto thing 

<script>document.write("<a href=\"mailto:name" + "@domain\"><img src=\"path/to/image.ext\"></a>);</script>

i cant remember if that works, but its not that hard to make it better

Read full topic
